snippet: The murder trial of the former editor of Guns & Ammo magazine was declared a mistrial when the jury could not reach a verdict on Wednesday.
abstract: Murder trial of former Guns & Ammo magazine editor Richard Erick Venola of Golden Valley, Arizona, is declared a mistrial when the jury could not reach a verdict; he is charged with shooting death of unarmed neighbor James Patrick O'Neill.
lead_paragraph: The murder trial of the former editor of Guns & Ammo magazine was declared a mistrial when the jury could not reach a verdict on Wednesday.

headline.main: Arizona: Mistrial for Firearms Magazine Ex-Editor
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Mistrial For Firearms Magazine Ex-Editor
